titleInfo.title: Invitation to the Ground Breaking of the new Christian Brothers College

mods.abstract: The ground breaking for the new Christian Brothers College building at the intersection of East Parkway and Central took place on September 17, 1939. About 300 alumni attended the event.
mods.accessCondition: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law.
